alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 3:17PM CDT until October 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... East central Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... South central Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 316 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gracemont, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Anadarko, Tuttle, Union City, Minco, Gracemont, Cogar, and Lake Chickasha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
